comment.author: 72851851@N05
comment._content: This is a lovely photograph of the Gray Family who lived at Outlack House, Lisnadill.  By September 1907 three of the girls [Elizabeth, Vina and Eveline] had already emigrated to America and in November of that same year 16 year old Annie followed.  From left to right they are - Annie, Martha Lavina [Vina], Rebecca, Herbert, Mrs Jane Gray [nee Couser], Eveline, Thomas, Elizabeth and Mary Ethel.
